Best Practices for Asynchronous Components

Customers don’t have to respond to asynchronous components right away. When you add an asynchronous component to a bot conversation, carefully consider your conversation design to gracefully handle errors and changes in context.

To use enhanced Messaging channels with Enhanced Bots, view required editions.
Conversation Design for Asynchronous Components
Because customers don’t have to respond to asynchronous components right away, these components require careful conversation design. Use asynchronous component settings and Rule conditions and actions to ensure a natural conversational experience.
Error Handling for Asynchronous Components
Asynchronous components include an optional error variable to give you more control over how to handle specific errors.
title: Service Cloud Best Practices for Asynchronous Components
